name: Enhanced SDLC with Extensions
description: Multi-agent SDLC workflow with checkpoint/resume support and extension features: Versioned Environment (01), Artifact Extraction (02), Multi-Agent System (03), Incremental Execution (07), and Composite Guards (08).

g_config.description: Extract project configuration (source_root, package_name) from documentation

g_add.description: Generate pytest-arch tests from architecture documentation

g_rules.description: Extract structured architecture rules from tests and specification (deterministic, no LLM)

g_coder.description: Generate implementation with composite validation (Extension 08): syntax/structure, quality gates, architecture tests. All feedback routes to CoderGenerator.

g_merge_ready.description: Final composite check verifying all gates passed
